about.details:
Incorporated in 2017, Prizor Viztech Limited provides security and surveillance solutions with a wide range of CCTV cameras for retail, government, education, and infrastructure. In 2022, the company expanded its product line to include televisions, touch panels, and monitors, all sold under its brand name and manufactured by third parties. Additionally, the company offers video management software that provides surveillance features to customers on a single monitor and location.

The company's product portfolio is divided into two main parts:

  1. Security and Surveillance Solutions, including network cameras, high-definition analogue cameras, network video recorders, and digital video recorders; and
  2. LED televisions, Monitors & Touch Panels.

The company has supplied products across 17 states and 2 union territories in India, namely: Andhra Pradesh, Assam, Delhi, Goa, Gujarat, Haryana, Karnataka, Kerala, Madhya Pradesh, Maharashtra, Punjab, Rajasthan, Sikkim, Tamil Nadu, Telangana, Uttar Pradesh, and West Bengal, as well as the union territories of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and Jammu and Kashmir.

The company's workshops are accredited with ISO 9001:2015 and ISO 14001:2015. Additionally, the company holds ISO 27001:2013 certification for the 'Information Security Management System Standard,' showcasing our commitment to data security and safeguarding sensitive information.
As of July 2024, the company has 29 permanent employees in various departments.

faqs.question: What is the Prizor Viztech IPO?
faqs.answer:
Prizor Viztech IPO is a SME IPO of 2891200 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹25.15 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹87 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on July 12, 2024, and closes on July 16, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Prizor Viztech IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Prizor Viztech IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Prizor Viztech IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Prizor Viztech IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Prizor Viztech IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Prizor Viztech IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Prizor Viztech IPO opens on July 12, 2024 and closes on July 16, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Prizor Viztech IPO?
faqs.answer: Prizor Viztech IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,39,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Prizor Viztech IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Prizor Viztech IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Prizor Viztech IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Prizor Viztech IPO will be done on Thursday, July 18, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, July 19, 2024. Check the Prizor Viztech IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Prizor Viztech IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Prizor Viztech IPO listing date is on Monday, July 22, 2024.
